mapper.select: SELECT ENTRY_ID AS entryId, ENTRY_STATE AS entryState, ENTRY_TYPE AS entryType, ENTRY_OPERATOR AS entryOperator, ENTRY_REMARK AS entryRemary, ENTRY_CREATOR AS entryCreator, ENTRY_CREATETIME AS entryCreateTime, ENTRY_CHECKER AS entryChecker, ENTRY_CHECKTIME AS entryCheckTime, ENTRY_INOUT AS entryInout, PROCUREMENT_ID AS procurementId, ORDER_ID AS orderId FROM STOCK_DETAIL
